ns:common.document.text: The 2.PAK language is an artificial intelligence language with coroutines.\nIt is based on the 1.PAK and the Simula 67 languages and it was designed in 1975. The main goal of its design was to provide a good set of primitive types for the AI applications.\nThis article is based on material taken from the Free On-line Dictionary of Computing prior to 1 November 2008 and incorporated under the \"relicensing\" terms of the GFDL, version 1.3 or later.
